title: Police: Teen accidentally shoots himself near University of Memphis
content:
MEMPHIS, Tenn. — A teen was taken to the hospital after accidentally shooting himself in the 800 block of South Graham Street, police said.
Officers responded to the location around 7:30 p.m. Saturday and found the 17-year-old suffering from a gunshot wound.
He was transported to Regional Medical Center. He is not in critical condition, police said.
